channel.title: Potions
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I'm using a devolution 7.0 server source and was wondering how to make potions give you 5+ levels then decrease slowly ( Like real runecape ). As a temporary resort until i have figured this out i have just made potions add experience :|. I'm aware to add into case 132 and all of that its' just the getting the potion to add to your level then decrease slowly.
All help is appreciated.
Thanx! :)
